ARABIC: لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ بِهِۦ حَتَّىٰ يَرَوُا۟ ٱلْعَذَابَ ٱلْأَلِيمَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: They will not have iman in it until they see the painful punishment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: They will not believe it until they behold the painful punishment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: They will not believe in it until they clearly see the grievous chastisement.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: They will not believe in it until they suffer the painful torment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: They will not believe in it to the extent that they see the painful punishment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: They will not believe in it until they see the painful torment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: They will not believe in it until they see the painful punishment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: who will not believe in it, until they see the painful chastisement
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: They will not believe in it till they behold the painful doom,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: they will not believe in it until they see the grievous punishment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: They will not believe therein until they behold the torment afflictive.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: they do not believe in it until they sight the painful punishment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: They will not believe in it until they see the grievous Penalty;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: They will not believe in it until they see the painful torment;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: they shall not believe in it until they see the painful punishment
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: They will not believe in it until they witness the painful punishment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: They will not believe in it until they see the painful punishment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [26:201] They will not believe in it until they behold the painful chastisement,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (They will not believe in it) so that they do not believe in Muhammad (pbuh) or in the Qur'an (till they behold the painful doom,
